remarks: An ` N ` x ` N ` diagonal matrix over (the ring) ` R ` is an ` N ` x ` N ` matrix over (the ring) ` R ` .  (Contributed by AV, 18-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dmatval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
dmatval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
dmatval.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
dmatval.d $e |- D = ( N DMat R ) $.
dmatmat $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. D -> M e. B ) ) $.
